      • Jour

        public Jour​(java.lang.String date,
            int jour,
            double temperatureMoyenne)
        Constructor of Jour
        Parameters:
        date - the date of the jour to create (format : YYYY-MM-DD)
        temperatureMoyenne - the average temperature (must be between -40 and 60)
        jour - the day of the week ("Lundi", "Mardi", "Mercredi", "Jeudi", "Vendredi", "Samedi", "Dimanche")

      • Jour

        public Jour​(java.lang.String date,
            int jour,
            java.lang.String vacances,
            double temperatureMoyenne)
        Constructor of Jour
        Parameters:
        date - the date of the jour to create (format : YYYY-MM-DD)
        temperatureMoyenne - the average temperature (must be between -40 and 60)
        jour - the day of the week (0-6)
        vacances - the holidays (null if there is no holidays)
